title: No-bake cheesecake for a crowd
ingredients: ['200g digestive biscuit crumbs', '100g caster sugar', '110g melted butter', '675g cream cheese, softened', '2 (397g) tins condensed sweetened milk', '125ml lemon juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '325g whipped cream', '1kg fruit filling or compote of choice']
